name: GreenOrange
goal: The company provides strategic advice on policy and trade related issues across the global agri-business and food sectors with a focus on the EU
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Agriculture and trade policies that could impact international trade in grains and oilseeds
Policies and legislation with respect to agricultural biotechnology, including the assessment and authorization of new biotechnology products.
Policy and legislation on plant breeding innovations (gene-editing)
Policies and legislation that may set new requirements with respect to sustainability in the food chain
Legislation on the authorization of active substances used in pesticides and on Maximum Residue Limits
